review.title: “It was a great learning experience”
review.pros: Pros – You get to learn a lot of technical stuff and work, and more importantly know team work and prove to be a better team worker
review.cons: Cons – When working for any arts and creative industry, the only cons is that ideas clash with in your own team and groups. solving the clashes without hurting any one's egos is the biggest challenge which you really need to be street smart.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
